ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.ode

Class ODE

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.ode.ODE
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    A1, A1, A2, A2, A3, A3, A4, A4, A5, AdditiveODE, B1, B1, B2, B2, B3, B4, B5, BrusselatorODE, C1, C1, C2, C2, C3, C4, C5, D1, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, D6, E1, E1, E2, E2, E3, E3, E4, E4, E5, E5, F1, F1, F2, F2, F3, F3, F4, F4, F5, F5, HiresODE, LuoRudyODE, OrbitArenstorfODE, PleiadesODE, PollutionODE

    public abstract class ODE
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a typical ordinary differential equation with a single RHS.

    In order to define the RHS of an ODE, the method f is overridden.

      • f

        public abstract org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector f(org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 t,
                                               org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector y)
        This method defines the RHS and returns the derivatives of each component with respect to a solution and solution value.
        Parameters:
        t - The solution time to evaluate the RHS at.
        y - The solution values to evaluate the RHS with.
        Returns:
        The value of the RHS at the given time and solution values.
